channel.title: Rune Gods / 2 Worlds / Updated Drops / Gambling / PvP Tournament
channel.description:
Virus Scan proof; http://r.virscan.org/report/881c30e659798290fac75cf6cf3527df.html
[b][u]Killing Spree: [/u][/b] If you kill someone, you will gain +1 killing spree. If you get killed, your killing spree will be reset to 0. Every 5 killing spree gained, a message will be displayed to all players online, and a new killing spree rank will be given. By default (0 killing spree), the rank will be "No Rank".
[u][b]PvP Tournament: [/b][/u] This basically is a tournament where you pay an entry fee of 50,000 coins. Then, you will be teleported to a waiting room. When 2 or more people have entered, a count down timer will begin. When the count down has finished, you will be teleported to level 50 wilderness (mage arena) where you fight to death. The winner will then be teleported to Edgeville and be rewarded with a cash prize. The cash prize is the amount of entry fees that was recieved.
[u][b]Staff:[/b][/u] Pmod 0/3 Mod 0/3 Event Staff 0/3
[u][b]Starter Items:[/b][/u] -Runes -Armor -Weapon -Mage Set -Gold -Arrows -Bow -Axe -Tinderbox -Staff
[u][b]Updates:[/b][/u] Fixed Updated Drops Fixed Gambling Fixed PvP Tournament
[u][b]Quests: [/b][/u] -Romeo & Juliet Quest. -Druidic Ritual Quest. -Witch's Potion Quest. -Doric's Quest. -Imp Catcher Quest. -Sheep Shearer Quest. -Cook's Assistant Quest.
[u][b]Features: [/b][/u] -Gambling. -PvP tournament. -Quest Tab. -Combat Tab. -Kills and Deaths in combat tab. -K/D Ratio in combat tab. -Killing Spree in combat tab. -Killing Spree Rank in combat tab -All skills working -full working combat
[u][b]Website:[/b][/u] [URL=http://"http://rune-gods.tk"]Rune Gods[/URL]
[u][b]Screen Shots:[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/290vfhj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/iemk1y.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/xcmww2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/nxndyq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/25yyv4p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/21b5hl1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rm5qgi.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2q1bgbd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/70jdde.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/23wcnb.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rune Gods / 2 Worlds / Updated Drops / Gambling / PvP Tournament
item.dc:creator: @Tim_Dog Tim Dog
item.description:
@Tim_Dog wrote:

i cannot take this serious. the most important info would be the rate of the server, but it is missing. then the poster is named “elitehackers” lol lmao. the installer looks suspicious and i never saw something like that for a rsc private server.

recommendation: no one should try this.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune Gods / 2 Worlds / Updated Drops / Gambling / PvP Tournament

thats why there is a virus scan to show its just an installer just like all other games have it just installs the game files in program and puts an icon on the desktop to click and play more easy this way

working on some npcs that will give rewards like armor ect

item.title: Rune Gods / 2 Worlds / Updated Drops / Gambling / PvP Tournament
item.dc:creator: @EliteHackers EliteHackers
item.description:
@EliteHackers wrote:

Virus Scan proof;
http://r.virscan.org/report/881c30e659798290fac75cf6cf3527df.html

Killing Spree:
If you kill someone, you will gain +1 killing spree. If you get killed, your killing spree will be reset to 0. Every 5 killing spree gained, a message will be displayed to all players online, and a new killing spree rank will be given. By default (0 killing spree), the rank will be “No Rank”.

PvP Tournament:
This basically is a tournament where you pay an entry fee of 50,000 coins. Then, you will be teleported to a waiting room. When 2 or more people have entered, a count down timer will begin. When the count down has finished, you will be teleported to level 50 wilderness (mage arena) where you fight to death. The winner will then be teleported to Edgeville and be rewarded with a cash prize. The cash prize is the amount of entry fees that was recieved.

Staff:
Pmod 0/3
Mod 0/3
Event Staff 0/3

Starter Items:
-Runes
-Armor
-Weapon
-Mage Set
-Gold
-Arrows

-Axe

-Staff

Fixed PvP Tournament

-Romeo & Juliet Quest.
-Druidic Ritual Quest.
-Witch’s Potion Quest.
-Doric’s Quest.
-Imp Catcher Quest.
-Sheep Shearer Quest.
-Cook’s Assistant Quest.

-Kills and Deaths in combat tab.
-K/D Ratio in combat tab.
-Killing Spree in combat tab.
